channel.title: BUbuisnessAndMarket
channel.description: This is an interleaved feed of the most recent entries from BUbuisnessAndMarket, skipping any feeds with errors.

item.title: Albertsons and Kroger CEOs tell skeptical government that grocery mega merger won’t lead to store closures and higher prices
item.description: The two CEOs said merging would allow the supermarket companies to lower prices and more effectively compete with retail giants like Walmart, Costco a...

item.title: Verizon to acquire Frontier Communications in $20 billion deal to boost fiber network
item.description: Verizon said on Thursday it would buy Frontier Communications in an all-cash deal valued at $20 billion to boost its fiber network.

item.title: Trump blasts Harris’s support for tax on unrealized capital gains for the rich
Deloitte-run Medicaid systems are riddled with glitches that can cost millions and take years to fix
item.description: Medicaid beneficiaries risk losing access to health care and food due to error-prone state eligibility systems.

item.title: Thursday's analyst calls: Buy the Nvidia dip, General Motors gets downgraded
item.description: A chipmaker and an auto giant were among the stocks being talked about by analysts on Thursday.

item.title: Why the stock market’s September slide isn’t done yet
Elon Musk’s misery is limited to Brazil for now, but EU sanctions may be coming his way
item.description: Potential fines could be as high as six percent of X's annual worldwide turnover unless the company makes changes in line with EU demands.

item.title: A supersized Fed rate cut this month could be 'very dangerous' for markets, economist warns
item.description: A deeper interest rate cut from the Federal Reserve this month could spook financial markets, according to one economist.

item.title: A new recession warning is about to flash as investors await August jobs report
New wave of Chinese migrants are flocking to Mexico
item.description: The arrival of Chinese multinationals is leading an influx of “people from eastern China, more educated and with a broader global background.”

item.title: Visa debuts a new product designed to make it safer to pay directly from your bank account
item.description: Visa said it plans to launch a dedicated service for bank transfers, skipping credit cards and the traditional direct debit process.

item.title: Topgolf Callaway wants to split up. Here’s what could complicate the breakup.
Germany’s DAX 40 has a new female CEO: Daimler Truck appoints Karin Radstrom as next head in rare move
item.description: Radstrom will become just the second female CEO of a DAX 40 firm, joining Belen Garijo, the head of pharmaceutical giant Merck KGaA.

item.title: India and Singapore agree to cooperate on chips as countries seek to strengthen partnership
item.description: "Singapore is not just a partner, it is an inspiration for every developing country. We want to create a bunch of Singapores in India," Modi said in a...

item.title: Harris wants tax breaks for startups — but small-business owners have questions
